title: DAY BY DAY
lyrics:
Ginagin haluga da jinagago
Amudo eobsneun jib-e dol-aol ttae
Gamanhi anj-a iss-eul ttae
Na honja eum-ag-eul deul-eul ttae Babe
Sichim-i jejalilo dol-awado

Jigeumcheoleom jam-i jal an wado

Honjaseo bab-eul meog-eodo TVleul bwado

Syawoleul haedo nun gamgo iss-eodo



Maeil achim-e nun tteul ttaebuteo

Yeojeonhae Day by day by day

Neowa majuchin sunganbuteo

Cheoeum bwass-eul ttaebuteo



Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Ay

Nae son-eul ppeod-eumyeon nega dah-ass-eumyeon

Neoui achim-i doeeoss-eumyeon hae

Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Uh Ay

Nun gam-ado nega boineun

Naui bamgwa gat-ass-eumyeon hae



Ije neoman boyeo

Only you jakku boyeo ajigdo

Dalkomhage sogsag-ideon neoui moseubkkajido

Aleumdawo

Nae gamjeongdeul-i moyeo neol bwaya mam-i noh-yeo

Iyuga eobs-eo

Geunyang jakku nega boyeo



Chinguleul mannago neoui yaegil hamyeon

Iyu eobs-i us-eum-i na

Gibun-i joh-eun nal-edo uulhal ttaedo

Ttabunhal ttaedo nae gyeot-e eobs-eodo



Maeil achim-e nun tteul ttaebuteo

Yeojeonhae Day by day by day



Neowa majuchin sunganbuteo

Cheoeum bwass-eul ttaebuteo



Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Ay

Nae son-eul ppeod-eumyeon nega dah-ass-eumyeon

Neoui achim-i doeeoss-eumyeon hae

Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Uh Ay

Nun gam-ado nega boineun

Naui bamgwa gat-ass-eumyeon hae



Maeil neoman boyeo

Maeil-eul da jugo sip-eo

Jumeoni sog-e neohgo sip-eo

Cheoeum bwass-eul ttaebuteo

Nan imi sijag-in geol



Nado moleuge mam-i ppaleuge neoleul hyanghae ttwieo

Naui halue jeongmal daleuge neo eobs-in teong bieo

Kkumman gat-a neon dalkomhan eum-ag gat-a

I nolae gat-i neoman boinikka natana



Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Ay

Nae son-eul ppeod-eumyeon nega dah-ass-eumyeon

Neoui achim-i doeeoss-eumyeon hae

Jakku neoman boyeo yeppeo boyeo Uh Ay

Nun gam-ado nega boineun

Naui bamgwa gat-ass-eumyeon hae



Neo bakk-e an boyeo

Amuleohji anhge mannago

Aleumdawo

Sigan-eul nanugo

Neo bakk-e an boyeo

Neoui jigeum-igo sip-eo

Aleumdawo

Every day ï¼† Every night

Jakku neoman boyeo
